title: Gina Beale: Into the Fire
description: No Vampires.No love triangles.Just a woman beating on monsters with a table leg.Gina Beale felt stuck in her career, so when it turns out she has the talent to work for the Collegium, old gods defending the modern world from ancient threats, she jumps in with both feet. Her timing could've been better, as Marduk, the ancient god of Babylon, has turned up to make the world pay for forgetting him. Armed with a sharp tongue and her trusty table leg, Gina might be the best chance our world has to survive.
author: Dan Trudeau
